game_description: CREATE The eyeora VR studio offers a user friendly drag n drop tool, creates 360 scenes with real-time gaze control hotspots and auto-sync's multiple camera angles in main scene feature, making anyone a PRO VR content creator. CUSTOMISE Via the VR studio create your own customised 3D VR Room. It can be fully branded, with banners, logos and URL links or PRO 360 content with hotspots, real-time editor allowing other VR explorers a social VR space. CONNECT Social VR events can be scheduled via the eyeora VR studio. Free or Paid plan can invite private groups to explore into your VR room, assign content to view in event or leave open entry via a public VR event, build your network.
review_1: This VR platform social VR feature is so easy to use and I can also become a group leader, invite explorers in a public or private room meet-up, leith life like avatars and verbal chat... love it, highly recommended
